title: 2.2 Master Challenge 1
question:
Look at the following scripts for two different sprites.

Both the sprites move when the (green flag) is clicked.

Which of the following is correct? Tick the right choice.

Both the sprites cover different distances.
Both the sprites cover the same distance.

Give a reason for your answer.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
